messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What types of terrain will Eugene and Louis encounter during the chase?
Forest-based terrain
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of roll is required to weave rapidly through a dense area of young trees?
DEX roll
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen if Eugene gains a lead of three locations on Louis?
Louis may ask for Spot Hidden rolls to keep him in view, or Track rolls to follow his trail.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the undead monstrosity's goal if followed by Louis?
To conduct a swift attack to cause as much confusion as possible, aiming to disappear into the forest.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen if Louis is followed?
He will conduct a swift attack to cause as much confusion as possible, aiming to disappear into the forest.
You are a helpful assistant.
How will Louis escape if left alone?
He will escape into the darkness.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen at midnight to wake everyone up?
An explosion somewhere in the distance to the north will be heard, caused by the survey team blowing the rocks free from the crystal monolith.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why will Louis pretend to be dead?
He will wait until he receives a blow of reasonable force to make it look feasible for him to play dead, as he is a walking corpse.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the team's goal in the survey?
They are blowing rocks free from the crystal monolith.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does the team see after the initial blast?
A faint blue light can be seen lingering.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the rustling noise that the team detects?
Another posse team appears out of the darkness.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why are the posse teams heading back to town?
They are fleeing the forest and the bad dreams they experienced.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the reason behind the appearance of another posse team in the darkness?
They are heading back to town.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of Gla'aki's Dream Call on the investigators as they approach the lake?
The forest canopy grows thick, leaving the investigators walking in a dim half-light.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of a successful Listen roll for the investigators?
Those succeeding realizing that there is no sound of wildlife at all.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of a failed Sanity roll for the investigators?
0/1 SAN loss.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the condition of the undergrowth in the forest?
unnaturally pale-sickly yellow
You are a helpful assistant.
What happened to the artists' camp?
there are signs of a struggle or fight
You are a helpful assistant.
What happened to Turner and his gang?
they came in the dead of night, taking the artists to the lake
You are a helpful assistant.
Where is the artists' camp located?
not far from the trail used by the trucks heading to the dig site
You are a helpful assistant.
When did Turner and his gang arrive at the campsite?
The dead of night
You are a helpful assistant.
How many artists were staying at the campsite?
Six
